description:
Goh`s Drizzile is the evolved form of Goh`s Sobble. After rescuing Goh`s Oddish from being hit by a Berry, it evolved into Drizzile. It had been hoping to evolve into an Inteleon but when it saw it`s reflection in the water it was disappointed and became depressed.
Goh`s Inteleon is the evolved form of Goh`s Drizzile. After training at night for days on end, it spotted Gizmo`s Kecleon trying to steal data from the laboratory and during a battle against it on the roof, it evolved and managed to stop it and get the data back.
name: Jimereon (Gou)
